Summary: Bright Orange light which got bigger... hovered and then several lights came from it and the orage light zigzaged and then was gone.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside smoking a cig... when I saw a Bright Orange light which got bigger... hovered and then several lights came from it and the orage light zigzaged and then was gone. I was not afraid... which was weird... but was more in shock or disbelief for what I had just seen!
